Speeds
0x0400 Scroll 4X
0x0200 Scroll 2X
0x0100 Scroll at the same rate as the FG
0x0080 Scroll 1/2
0x0040 Scroll 1/4
0x0020 Scroll 1/8
0x0010 Scroll 1/16

BG 2 X Scroll Rate Table SNES 0x04FB6E ROM 0x027D6E
40 00 80 00 00 01 80 00 80 00 80 00 80 00 80 00
40 00 C0 00 80 00 C0 00 00 00 80 00 00 00 00 00
80 00 80 00 80 00 80 00 40 00 00 01 00 01 00 01
00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01

BG 2 Y Scroll Rate Table SNES 0x04FBAE ROM 0x027DAE
40 00 FF FF FF FF 40 00 40 00 40 00 40 00 40 00
FF FF 60 00 40 00 FF FF 00 00 FF FF 00 00 00 00
00 01 40 00 40 00 40 00 40 00 00 01 00 01 00 01
00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01

BG 3 X Scroll Rate Table SNES 0x04FBEE ROM 0x027DEE
20 00 40 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 40 00 33 01 80 00
40 00 40 00 20 00 00 00 40 00 00 00 40 00 00 00
40 00 40 00 80 00 C0 00 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 01
00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01

BG 3 Y Scroll Rate Table SNES 0x04FC2E ROM 0x027E2E
20 00 FF FF FF FF FF FF 00 00 40 00 33 01 40 00
FF FF 20 00 20 00 00 00 20 00 00 00 40 00 00 00
00 01 20 00 40 00 60 00 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 01
00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01


BG 4 X Scroll Rate Table SNES 0x04FC6E ROM 0x027E6E
00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 66 01 00 00
00 01 00 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
20 00 60 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 01
00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01

BG 4 Y Scroll Rate Table SNES 0x04FCAE ROM 0x027EAE
00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 00 00 00
00 01 00 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
00 01 20 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 00 01 00 01 00 01
00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01 00 01
